Where Recruiters Learn to Lead — And Candidates Learn to Win.

NLEY’s tailored courses bridge skill gaps and unlock career growth from both sides of the hiring table.

Apply for course
course

The Recruitment MBA By Amit Nagdev

Master the Art and Science of Recruitment — From Fundamentals to Future-Ready Skills

Transforming Talent Acquisition Professionals of Tomorrow

The Recruitment MBA is a career-defining program designed by Amit Nagdev, a seasoned recruitment strategist and industry mentor, to equip aspiring and current recruitment professionals with end-to-end mastery in modern hiring practices.This intensive, practical course is built for freshers, freelancers, career switchers, and early-stage recruiters who want to establish a strong foothold in the HR and talent acquisition industry. Whether you're stepping into recruitment for the first time or looking to upgrade your approach with the latest techniques, this program is your fast-track route to becoming a confident and competent recruiter.

What You’ll Learn

Master the Art and Science of Recruitment — From Fundamentals to Future-Ready Skills

Core Recruitment Process

Learn the full hiring cycle — from understanding job briefs to final placement, with real-world applications.

Strategic Talent Sourcing

Master sourcing strategies using job portals, LinkedIn, Boolean search, and passive talent outreach.

Interviewing & Candidate Evaluation

Conduct structured, insightful interviews and make hiring decisions that stick.

Client & Hiring Manager Engagement

Develop the communication, relationship, and consultative skills every recruiter needs.

Recruitment Technology & Tools

Hands-on training with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), CRMs, and candidate engagement tools.

Market Mapping & Industry Intelligence

Learn how to analyze hiring trends, skill demands, and competitor landscapes.

Freelance & Consulting Recruitment

Build your own recruitment business or consulting practice — with operational, legal, and branding guidance.

Who Should Enroll?

Graduates & Freshers

Graduates & Freshers exploring a career in HR or recruitment

Freelance Recruiters

Freelance recruiters seeking structured expertise and client confidence

Recruiters

Recruiters in the early phase of their careers looking to sharpen their skills

Transitioning Professionals

Professionals transitioning into the HR/talent space from other fields

Startup Founders

Startup founders hiring for their teams and wanting to learn recruitment hands-on

Why Choose The Recruitment MBA by Amit Nagdev?

Designed and delivered by a recruitment leader with 5+ years of global hiring expertise

Combines theory, practical tools, live simulations, and real-world assignments​

Industry-relevant certification upon completion

Lifetime access to course materials + post-course mentorship

Flexible learning options: online, hybrid, and instructor-led live sessions

Call Us

You can call us on

  • +91 9137 39 3383
  • +91 9137 39 3378

Apply for Course

Please fill in the details. Once submitted, a member of our team will reach out to you shortly.

How it helps

Become a Certified Senior Recruiter with End-to-End Expertise

Unlock your full potential as a recruitment professional with The Recruitment MBA — a comprehensive, industry-aligned course designed to transform you into a senior-level recruiter with advanced skills and confidence.

Interviewing & Candidate Evaluation Skills

Learn how to conduct behavioral interviews, evaluate candidates effectively, and collaborate with hiring managers to make the right hiring decisions.

Freelance & Consulting Readiness

Gain the confidence and skills to work independently as a freelance recruiter or recruitment consultant.

Personalized Career Support

Receive one-on-one guidance on resume building, LinkedIn optimization, and interview preparation for recruitment roles.

Get notified when
new job is posted
